name: Museum Mice Mix-Up!
description:
A two player TTRPG to be played over voice call.

---------------------------------

You are a mouse working for the esteemed Motzerellah Museum, alongside your coworker: a fellow mouse researcher you've worked with for years.

Tomorrow's the biggest exhibit ever, showcasing the everyday items of so called "humans," immense creatures who have been extinct for a very long time.

But you and your coworker's list of needed relics get mixed up the day before the showcase! 

You'll have to scramble to describe to each other what these strange, unknown objects are, and then retrieve them from the archeological site of an ancient human's house... (Or at least, find something that's close enough!)

---------------------------------

---------------------------------

Playing the game:

This is a two player game, where both players need to be in different locations and communicate through voice call. (For example, Discord)

Both players should ideally be able to move around their space while remaining on the call. Players will also need a method of looking at the rulebook/relic list while on the call; they can either view it digitally or print it out.

---------------------------------

Read the postmortem retrospective thing here.

---------------------------------
